Reference

Areal Weighted Interpolation, Core

Core functions for performing areal weighted interpolation.

aw_interpolate()

Interpolate Values

aw_validate()

Valdating Data for Interpolation

aw_preview_weights()

Preview Areal Weights

aw_verify()

Verify Correct Extensive-Sum Interpolation

Areal Weighted Interpolation, Workflow

Functions for manually reproducing areal weighted interpolation workflow.

aw_intersect()

Intersect Source and Target Data

aw_total()

Create new total area field in intersection

aw_weight()

Calculate area weight using source ID areas

aw_calculate()

Make field new variable

aw_aggregate()

Aggregate new field of interest by target IDs

Data

Data sets included in package.

ar_stl_asthma

Asthma in St. Louis by Census Tract, 2017

ar_stl_race

Race in St. Louis by Census Tract, 2017

ar_stl_wards

Ward Boundaries in St. Louis, 2010

ar_stl_wardsClipped

Clipped Ward Boundaries in St. Louis, 2010
